Text: RE SIGNINPROBLEMSTo PAULLUCCI Account Wed like to share some information with you In accordance with your membership plan any free order submitted prior to our receipt of your payment for your qualifying selection would not be processed Your understanding is appreciated Your Friends at BMG Music Service B T

RE SIGNINPROBLEMSTo PAUL LUCCI Account We are sorry to hear that you have experienced difficulties signing into our website Please follow the steps below for a successful log in Go to our website at If you are a member visiting our site for the first time click on the Members visiting for the first time link If you have visited the site previously click on the I forgot my Password link Submit the requested information exactly as shown Account Number Zip Code Please note that your account number contains only ten digits Your account number may have additional numbers or letters following it when it is printed on Club correspondence Any extra characters should be disregarded as they are for use in our office only Also if you have moved recently you should try to log in with your previous Zip Code first If you are a first time member and wish to use a Member Name and Password fill in the required information and click on Enter Please remember that the Member Name and Password are casesensitive New website users cannot sign on to the site as a member for the first time when the Real Time Link which verifies account information is down around AM Monday Saturday and from PM PM Sunday Therefore if you are not yet a registered website user it will be necessary to enter as a guest during these hours If you continue to experience problems please let us know When corresponding with us it is important to include your account number or full name and complete mailing address Also be sure to include a detailed description of the problem you are experiencing We hope this information has been helpful Your Friends at BMG Music Service B WSGN

RE SIGNINPROBLEMSTo PAUL LUCCI Account I am writing to share some information with you Thank you for your inquiry Once you have paid for one selection at full price we will be happy to rebill the other selections you have received as your remaining Free selections Please let us know if we may be of further assistance Your Friends at BMG Music Service FH X

RE RECENT ORDERTo PAULLUCCI Account We are always happy to serve you by mail However if at times it is more convenient to call you may reach us at Our service representatives are available to assist you between the hours of AM EST Monday through Friday The best time to reach us is between AM and PM EST when our lines are not quite so busy For prompt service please have your account number handy when you call Thank you It is a privilege to serve you Your Friends at BMG Music Service B GX
